    • Method Detail

      • setupOutputStream

        public static void setupOutputStream()
        Creates a new output stream to hold anything written to System.out. Should be called in the @BeforeEach method.

      • restoreStreams

        public static void restoreStreams()
        Sets System.in and System.out back to their normal values. Should be called in the @AfterEach method.

      • setInputStream

        public static void setInputStream(java.lang.String input)
        Sets the input stream to a string.
        Parameters:
        input - The string to be read from System.in.

      • getOutputStream

        public static java.lang.String getOutputStream()
        Gets the output stream as a string using UTF-8 encoding.
        Returns:
        The string written to System.out.

        public static java.lang.String getOutputStream(java.lang.String encoding)
        Gets the output stream as a string.
        Parameters:
        encoding - The encoding to decode with.
        Returns:
        The string written to System.out.
